body:
Comment 672 by **lwiklendt**: 
All these comments about changing the name from Go to Go2, Goo, Go++, or Goto are
ridiculous. First of all Go is as far away from Go! as Goto and Go++, that is, 1 
character. Go2 and Goo have the same number of characters as Go!, making Go even 
farther from Go! than those two.
